SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.net

Class RmiClientImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.net.RmiClientImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RmiClientInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RmiClientImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RmiClientInterface
The RmiClientImpl class is the implementation of the RmiClientInterface interface. It handles remote calls from the server to the client.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:
